about_the_game:
Types and themes of games
This is a visual novel game based on the theme of cultivating immortality in ancient Chinese history.

Game mechanism operation
Players can experience the story plot from a first person perspective by clicking with the mouse, and choose different options to influence the development of the plot.

Game Story and Background
The player is a cultivator, honored by their teacher's command to descend the mountain in search of their own heavenly tribulation.
In the chaotic times of the human world, he, who possesses Taoist and military skills, will encounter many people and things on his journey. Love and affection, life and death, are the main characters
Various changes also occurred in one's inner self, ultimately leading to the calamity of fate.
The game script is adapted from historical elements of the late Han Dynasty and is not an official history. Through games, you can gain a better understanding of the origins and significance of Chinese immortal culture
The role of history. The story combines Chinese martial arts and Taoist cultivation culture, and is a tale that promotes justice and kindness, involving hunger and suffering
Dark elements such as desolation, war, and slaughter.

The main attraction of the game
1. Story Experience - As a visual novel game, this is a single storyline script consisting of a main storyline and an emotional storyline, with the plot revolving around
The protagonist and the female lead unfold, ultimately resulting in only one complete ending. At the same time, in order to enhance the gaming experience, when players make decisions in the plot,
It will result in multiple incomplete game outcomes.
2. Visual Effects - Based on the plot, the costumes and architecture of the Han Dynasty are restored, and the character art design is mainly based on Chinese style elements to highlight the scene
The atmosphere presents a visual sense of film and television, allowing readers to immerse themselves more deeply. The scenes and characters are presented in the form of thick painted original paintings.
3. Sound effects - movie level, atmospheric sound effects and music.
